âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ REST API for WhatsApp automation â€¢ Session management â€¢ Sending text messages â€¢ Receiving messages (implicit) â€¢ QR code scanning for authentication
ðŸ“– Summary: WAHA is a WhatsApp HTTP API (REST API) that allows users to automate WhatsApp interactions through HTTP requests. It provides a simple way to send and receive messages, manage sessions, and integrate WhatsApp functionality into other applications. The API supports multiple engines, including browser-based (WEBJS), WebSocket Node.js (NOWEB), and WebSocket Go (GOWS).
